text: Soni chilikati cha ŵandu pana jwaakun’galagatilaga Allah chanchisegambali (mwakayichila), basi naga yimpatile yambone, jukasatulalila nayo (ni kuŵa mpela nsilamu nsyesyene), nambo naga gampatile masausyo, jukasagalauka ni ngope jakwe (jukasaujilaga ku ukafili wakwe), jupelelwe duniya ni Akhera, kwalakweko ni kupelelwa kwakuonechela
